definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Her left arm holds atablet with the date July 4th, 1776.
sentences.chinese: 左臂緊抱着的書板上刻着1776年7月4日的字樣。
